ygData.subject: Re: You want to know how weak warriors! Listen to t his!
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes but everyone hasn t been twinked like you :)
ygData.messageBody:
Yes but everyone hasn't been twinked like you :)

> ----------
> From: Dean Boyle[SMTP:gino_14@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 3:06 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] You want to know how weak warriors! Listen
> to this!
>
> From: Dean Boyle <gino_14@...>
>
> HEY, don't cancle... think about it.. when you look at GM's what do you
> see... lvl 50's ..ShodowKnights,Paladians and what..huh Warriors! There's
>
> go to be something at lvl 35+ about warriors, we're strong, skilled and
> can
> take the dmg, we're perfict tankers in groups and witht he right items we
> can take out shit hard and fast!
>
> One problem with warriors!!! We MUST, I REPEAT MUST, have the best item
> we
> can get at our leves, why.. couse we lack the skill of spells...with the
> right items we're powerfull...
>
> I can kill steall from a lvl 18-20 wiizie and I'm only lvl 15, why couse I
>
> have steel plaited pants and magical steel plated boots, Bloodstained
> tunic
> and arms, one Bracer O' Battle, other a +dex bracelete, two +STG rights,
> Steel Green Plated helm, one combined LS and in the other hand a FS LS...
>
> NOT trying to brag but with the right and best items we can do damge!!
>
> Don't quite my friend, EQ made the warriors class one of the best! you'll
> see!
>
>
> ----Original Message Follows----
> From: Jeff Lynch <jlynch13@...>
> Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] You want to know how weak warriors! Listen to this!
> Date: Sat, 12 Jun 1999 13:52:41 PDT
>
> From: Jeff Lynch <jlynch13@...>
>
>
> I play a 38th halfling warrior on Povar... I have some dam good equipment
> and am one of the higher warriors on the server... But something happened
> to
> me yesterday that I think highlights the warrior classes weakness... I
> decided I wanted to get that new dragoon's dirk from Dvinn in Crushbone...
> So I went there, camped in his room, for those of you that dont know,
> Dvinn
> is about a 25th level DE that is very tough.... He spawned and I attacked
> him... low and behold a wizzie... AN 18TH LEVEL WIZZIE.... ran into the
> room, and started blasting him! Guess what? AN 18TH LEVEL WIZZIE STOLE
> DVINN FROM A 38TH LEVEL WARRIOR!!!!! Do I need to say ANYTHING else? btw
> I
> was using a zweildahander.... This was the most embarassing thing that has
> ever happened to me... I'm sitting there in almost full rubicite, all
> these
> cool items, everyone is looking at me... and then i have the thing stolen
> from me by ONE, not a group, but ONE 18th level wizzie......grumbles
> something about warriors suck and I am ready to cancel my account...
>
>
> Eogun on Povar
>
>
